content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate production at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) and chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to fuel the burner mining drill before using it
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Ensure the steam engine has the required input liquid before starting the engine
### Errors when using boiler but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to fuel the boiler before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure the offshore pump has the required fluid present in connections before starting the pump
